name: Formula Bwoah: Online Multiplayer Racing
description:
Drive, not just manage

Decide your racing style and see if you have what it takes to come out on top.

Free to play

Online Racing is fun when you have loads of players to race against. That is why we are making the game Free to play and Cross Platform.

Cross Progression and Cross Platform

Formula Bwoah is available on Steam, iOS and Android. You can compete with users across different devices and seamlessly sync your progression across all your devices.

Strategy Matters

Make strategic decisions that can impact your victory, such as choosing the perfect tire compound and changing your engine modes.

Dynamic Weather System

Timing your pit stops just right and anticipating changing weather conditions can be the difference between winning and losing.

Online Competition

Compete with 10 other skilled drivers and see if you have what it takes to emerge victorious.
